mapper.select: select distinct * from order_view where mid=#{mid} and pid = #{pid} and ccolorcode = #{ccolorcode} and ssize=#{ssize}
mapper.insert: insert ALL into (oid, mid, ozipcode, oaddress1, oaddress2, odate, oreceiver, otel, ousedpoint, ousedcoupon, opayment, ostatus, oaccountdeadline, odiscounted) orderlist values(orderlist_seq.nextVal,#{mid},#{ozipcode},#{oaddress1},#{oaddress2}, sysdate,#{oreceiver},#{otel},#{ousedpoint},#{opayment},#{ostatus}, sysdate+7, #{odiscounted}) into (oid, pid, ccolorcode, ssize, oamount) orderitem values(order_seq.nextVal,#{pid},#{ccolorcode},#{ssize},#{oamount})
